glsa.title: UUDeview: Insecure temporary file creation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in UUDeview may allow local attackers to conduct symlink attacks.

background.p: UUdeview is encoder and decoder supporting various binary formats. NZBGet is a command-line based binary newsgrabber supporting .nzb files.

description.p: UUdeview makes insecure usage of the tempnam() function when creating temporary files. NZBGet includes a copy of the vulnerable code.

impact.p: A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary files on the system.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
